bug.author: inoxstasy
bug.description: Hello :) I am totally new at programming, and wanted some advice. I want to create a program using the google maps api. Is Python the adequate programming language to use? Thanks in advance for your answer :)

comments.comment: Hey inoxstasy, you are currently posting on a platform that is solely for issues related to the TensorFlow application and not at all meant for general programming questions like this. Try posting your question on <denchmark-link:https://www.reddit.com/r/learnprogramming/>https://www.reddit.com/r/learnprogramming/</denchmark-link> or <denchmark-link:https://stackoverflow.com/>https://stackoverflow.com/</denchmark-link> . Good luck with your project.

This question is better asked on <denchmark-link:http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged//tensorflow>StackOverflow</denchmark-link> since it is not a bug or feature request. There is also a larger community that reads questions there. Hence moving this to closed status.
